p: Analyzing gains and losses of high level of coffee shading in present time, means that this management seems to be more appropriate and efficient to the studied region, because it collaborates to both activities: mitigation and adaptation. Finally, the system may be conveniently used as proposed by Torres et al. (2010) and Luedeling et al. (2011) to reforest degraded lands, improve ecosystem services, sustainability, carbon sequestration and stock, and to reduce the environment degradation.
